column5: What kind of jig heads are good for the umbrella rig? Can I use regular round heads, can I use ewg weighted hooks?
Whatever works for the baits you are using. I don't see an advantage to rigging each bait weedless, since the rig itself is prone to hanging up.
i dont need it to be weedless, just wondering if it'll work with the weight on th bottom of the swimbait instead of the top.
